params.0: Leagues are time-limited game modes in which you can experience Old School RuneScape like never before!|Complete tasks to earn League Points that can be used to unlock powerful Relics which enhance your gameplay!|Each League is different - figure out the best strategy to pull ahead of the competition. Or alternatively, just have fun!
params.1: In Leagues, League Points can be earned by completing various tasks. These can then be used to unlock powerful Relics.|League Points are also transferred to your main game profile where they can be used to buy rewards in the Leagues Reward Shop.
params.2: Relics are powerful buffs which affect your gameplay for the entire League. Choose carefully, because choices cannot later be changed!
params.3:
Your performance in the League is measured by how many League Points you earn. And the more you score compared to your rivals, the higher League Rank you'll achieve!|The cut-offs for League Ranks are:|- Bronze: Earn 100 League Points
- Iron: Top 80%
- Steel: Top 60%
- Mithril: Top 40%
- Adamant: Top 20%
- Rune: Top 5%
- Dragon: Top 1%
params.4:
As well as letting you unlock Relics, League Points are transferred to your main game profile.|Points can be used to buy rewards in the Leagues Reward Shop.|Performance in one League will also contribute to the next, with rewards such as:|- League Starter Outfits
- League Icons
- League Participation Worlds
- Pet Transfers
